attributes.action: revote on the EU referendum as things we were promised are now proven a lie
attributes.additional_details: now in the court of law if a prosecutor was to give false statement in front of a jury which can have a huge impact on their final decision their is a possibility of a retrial. now I believe the public is no different from a jury and their are two sides sharing what we would expect  to be FACTS, it is now evident to be false so a revote must be the solution.
attributes.background: we were told that 350 million would be given to the NHS a week if we LEAVE the EU now it has come to light that the comment was a mistake. now I believe millions of people would of voted based on that fact alone as we all feel the NHS is a major issue.
